product_name: REI Trekking Pole Rubber Walking Tips - Pair - 2013 Closeout
long_description: This pair of REI Trekking Pole Rubber Walking Tips converts your hiking poles to street poles for urban exploring. Durable rubber tips feature wide, flat bases for grip and stability on pavement and other smooth surfaces. Tips are compatible with Komperdell poles and REI poles made by Komperdell.
short_description: This pair of REI Trekking Pole Rubber Walking Tips converts your hiking poles to street poles for urban exploring.
